name: Lunky Runner
description:
Lunky Runner is an experiment at building an auto-runner with a Spelunky style level generator. You run, you jump over spikes, jump onto walls to slide up them and swing on poles to go as high and collect as many coins as possible.

Background and Tile Graphics are from Marsh's 2D Art Pack, other graphics were done by myself.

The only button you need is SPACE.
